description_for_human: Leverage google maps reviews to find perfect places based on your preferences
description_for_model: A plugin that allows the user to retrieve personalized places based on a given address, radius, and type of place using ChatGPT.  It will return at most the top 10 recommendations sorted by closest distance. It will use user preferences to look through reviews and output most relevant places results. Ask at least 1 and at most 3 clarifying questions as needed to understand their preferences. Plugin takes into account how users are getting to the location when finding nearby places. For example, if they are walking it will recommend closer places compared to if they are driving, etc.
